resources.string: Welcome to NASAs image of the day!
First navigate to select a date to choose a date to look up the image for that day. Then click retrieve image and the application will load up the picture.
Use this page to learn how the application works.
Use this page to select a date by clicking the button under the text. A calendar will pop up to select a date. Finally, click the retrieve button to see the image of that day
Use this page to retrieve an image from the date that is selected. Press the save button to save the image into a list.
Use this page to access your saved images. Click on each list item to see extra details. Long press an item to bring up the ability to delete the image.
Use this page to print a message.
We hope you have a wonderful day!
Do you want to delete this?
